detected_errors.description: More than 50% of spaces from the 2D 3BHK plan are missing in the 3D model (2D shows 3 bedrooms, multiple toilets, balconies, utility, passages; 3D shows a much smaller layout with far fewer rooms).
Overall layout topology and proportions do not match the 2D plan (room count, adjacency, and footprint appear to be for a different apartment).

summary: Although the second image is genuinely 3D, it does not correspond to the provided 2D floor plan and omits the majority of required rooms/spaces.
